name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Best Offer Finder for eBay + more

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View best offer accepted price of eBay items right on the search result page! With no need to leave eBay!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I'm a big eBay user myself and wanted something simple to show the best offer accepted pricing when researching sold and completed listings on eBay without having to leave the page. I created this simple straightforward extension to show that :)

More features coming soon!

Feel free to contact me at bestofferfinder@gmail.com with any questions or feedback!

Update History
5/24/20  - Improved patch for new eBay update! Send me an email if you're having issues and I'll fix it! (bestofferfinder@gmail.com)
5/14/20  - Patched for new eBay update!
5/7/20  - Now supports all eBay regions! 
4/20/20 - Now supports eBay.com.au!!!!
12/13/19 - Now supports eBay.co.uk!!!!
12/12/19 - Now works on sold listings of specific sellers as well!
